item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 2, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

29. Avoid ISP Routers (2024) (254 points | 140 comments)
30. 'Obelisks', a new class of life living inside humans (71 points | 11 comments)
